none: Dollar Brand Quartet and Miriam Makeba - Live @ Berliner Philharmonie, 1978
Dollar Brand Quartet and Miriam Makeba
Dollar Brand Quartet and Miriam Makeba - Live @ Berliner Philharmonie, 1978

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 27, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
More magic uncovered by the folks at Loathed Sound, this time in the form of a 1978 collaboration recorded in Berlin. No attempt from me to regurgitate and paraphrase the results from blind internet searches, I'll just say that this was an incredibly good listen on a somewhat melancholic rainy morning...and most of us don't have any business asking for much more than that.  LIVE AT BERLINER PHILHARMONIE tears in their eyes are not for crying...
